tuv.seg: Voluntary development work abroad and social insurance
Obair dheonach forbartha thar lear agus árachas sóisialta

Irish citizens who have spent time working in a developing country may qualify for Credited Social Insurance Contributions in respect of the period spent working abroad and any preparatory period beforehand

D'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh saoránaigh Éireannacha atá am caite acu ag obair i dtír atá ag forbairt, in ann ranníocaíochtaí creidiúnaithe árachais shóisialaigh a fháil maidir leis an tréimhse a chaith siad ag obair thar lear chomh maith le haon tréimhse ullmhúcháin roimh ré
Working in the EU
Ag obair san AE
Deals with rights and entitlements when moving within the EU to work
Breathnú ar chearta agus teidlíochtaí maidir le bogadh san AE chun oibriú
In particular examines the EU freedom of movement directives, including access to employment, recognition of qualifications, job seeking, employment and social security rights
Go háirithe scrúdú treoracha de chuid an AE maidir le saorghluaiseacht lena n-áirítear rochtain ar fhostaíocht, aitheantas ar cháilíochtaí, lorg ar phost, cearta fostaíochta agus árachais sóisialach
Working outside the EU
Ag obair taobh amuigh den AE
Includes a list of items to be considered before going to work in a non-EU country and of the documentation you should bring with you
Liosta de na rudaí nach mór a chur san áireamh roimh dul ag obair i dtír atá taobh amuigh den AE agus na cáipeisí nach mór a thabhairt leat
Most Read in "Moving Country"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Ag bogadh tíre"
Irish citizenship through birth or descent
Saoránacht d'Éirinn ó bhreith nó ó ghinealach
Visa requirements for entering Ireland
Riachtanais víosa le teacht isteach in Éirinn
Coming to work in Ireland
Ag teacht go hÉirinn chun oibriú

Ag éirí i do shaoránach Éireannach
